1.SceneDescription:
Central Perk, Monica, Chandler, Phoebe, and Joey are there. Monica is holding a
piece of paper.

lines.Line:
So the wedding caterer sent me this list of twelve appetizers and I have
to narrow it down to six
Food? Uh-huh gimme! (She hands him the paper.

So did Monica tell you about this great band called the Swing Kings
that we’re trying to get to play at the wedding
Since when are you into swing music
Since when are you into swing music
Oh since forever! I used to go all over town listening to bands
Gap commercial. (To Monica) So did you book them? Did you call
Do you want me to call
No, I’ll do it. You just stick to your job

This is impossible Monica, why don’t you just pick all 15? (Hands
back the paper.

Oh yeah… (He mimes sticking his fingers into a jar of peanut butter,
scooping some out, and eating it off his fingers.

2.SceneDescription:
A Bridal Shop, Phoebe and Rachel are waiting for Monica who is trying on her
wedding dress.

lines.Line: (wearing a veil) Am I crazy or does this totally go?

lines.Character: (Monica enters from the dressing room wearing her gown
lines.Line: Monica enters from the dressing room wearing her gown.
Oh my God! You look so beautiful
Oh my God! You look so beautiful
(To Rachel) Thank you Rachel but, look at Monica
This is it. Yeah, this is the one. I can’t believe I found it
Wow you look so beautiful! If I knew you, I’d cry
Well I’m Monica Geller, ball like a baby
Well I’m Monica Geller, ball like a baby
Have you found your dress yet

Oh no, these dresses are all so amazing but there is no way I could
afford one

No, I can’t afford this either. No. I-I-I’m, I’m just
here to
figure out which one I want then I’m gonna get it at Kleinman’s, this discount
place in Brooklyn, day after tomorrow they are having a huge sale
Yeah! So-so when are you getting married
Oh I’m not, I just like to try these on
Oh I’m not, I just like to try these on
I’m just kidding. I’m getting married July 25<sup>th</sup>

I’m just kidding too. (Laughs) I’m getting married in
December. (Turns away not happy with herself.
(To Monica) So when are you getting married
(To Monica) So when are you getting married
We met with him. Did he show you the photos of the nude wedding he did
I know! I almost called off my wedding. Oh, who’s your band?
Oh, my fiancee wants the Swing Kings
Oh, my fiancee wants the Swing Kings
Oh, you’re so lucky. My fiancee wants the heavy metal band Carcass.

Ooh, is that spelled with a ‘C’ or a ‘K’? Oh my God!
It doesn’t matter; they’re both great

lines.Character: (Another woman walks past Rachel carrying a wedding dress
lines.Line: Another woman walks past Rachel carrying a wedding dress.

lines.Character: (Another woman walks past Rachel carrying a wedding dress
lines.Line: Another woman walks past Rachel carrying a wedding dress.

Oh y’know what? Y’know what? Now that you know what you want
you should go to Kleinman’s and get it half off. This place is so overpriced

So, does this (the dress) come in another color or… (The store
owner walks away.

3.SceneDescription:
Kleinman’s, a horde of women including Rachel, Phoebe, and Monica are
waiting for the store to open.

lines.Line: What is taking so long?! I mean whatever

All right, listen up. There is usually only one dress in each size so
when they open those doors, fan out. Now, this is what you’re looking for! (Holds up
a picture of it.) Memorize it! When you locate the dress, blow on these. All right? (She
passes out whistles to them.) Three short blasts. When you hear it, come running

lines.Character: (A worker comes to open the door and the horde starts to press forward
lines.Line: A worker comes to open the door and the horde starts to press forward.
(To Rachel) Hey! Don’t be a baby
(To Rachel) Hey! Don’t be a baby

lines.Character:
(The door opens allowing the horde to charge in, knocking Rachel out of the way and to
the ground
lines.Line:
The door opens allowing the horde to charge in, knocking Rachel out of the way and to
the ground.
(coming back out) Hey! Rachel! Come on!!!

lines.Character: [Time lapse, inside the store, Monica is frantically looking for her dress
lines.Line: Time lapse, inside the store, Monica is frantically looking for her dress.

No. No. Not it. Not it. Not it. (Checks another rack and another woman
tries to reach around her.) (To the woman) Don’t crowd me! (Finds it) This is it!
This is the dress! Oh my God, it’s perfect! (She takes it off of the rack and someone
has a hold of it on the other side of the rack and tugs on it.) I’m sorry, this
one’s taken! (The other woman tugs harder pulling Monica through the rack.) Whoa
Yes it is! You saw me wearing it
And now you’ll see me buying it
And now you’ll see me buying it

What? You freak! You wouldn’t even have known about this place if
it wasn’t for me
Look, you don’t want to fight me
Look, you don’t want to fight me
Maybe I do! I’m pretty feisty! (She blows the signal.

lines.Character: [Cut to Phoebe in another part of the store
lines.Line: Cut to Phoebe in another part of the store.

(hearing the signal) I’m coming! I’m coming! (She takes off
towards the signal and almost knocks another woman over.

lines.Character: (She hears another signal in another direction
lines.Line: She hears another signal in another direction.

Okay! (Runs that way and hears another whistle blast.) Hey! (Heads the
other way and hears another blast.) What do I do?!! (She runs in the second direction and
finds that the whistling is coming from inside a rack. She moves the dresses out of the
way to find Rachel curled up in a fetal position frantically blowing on the whistle.) What
are you doing? (Rachel doesn’t stop.) Did you find the dress? (Rachel won’t stop
so Phoebe pinches her nose shut which causes her to spit the whistle out.

No! You gotta get me out of here Phoebe! These bargain shoppers are
crazy
I—We gotta get Monica. (She starts to leave.
I—We gotta get Monica. (She starts to leave.
No! You gotta hold my hand!

Oh my God!! (She grabs Rachel’s hand and drags her towards Monica.)
Excuse me! Excuse me! (She’s knocking women and veils out of the way as she moves.)

lines.Character:
(She gets to Monica who has the dress balled up in one hand and is sitting on Megan who
is sprawled out on the floor
lines.Line:
She gets to Monica who has the dress balled up in one hand and is sitting on Megan who
is sprawled out on the floor.
(handing Phoebe the dress) Go! Go! Go
(handing Phoebe the dress) Go! Go! Go
NOW!!!!!!!! (Rachel runs off and Monica gets up to follow her.

4.SceneDescription: Central Perk, time lapse from the earlier scene.

lines.Line: Well obviously only one of us can keep dating her
Obviously! So, how do we decide

Well now let’s-let’s look at this objectively, I think I should
date her

(not buying it) Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Or, or I’m the one who dates
her
That’s interesting, but check this out. I date her
That’s interesting, but check this out. I date her
Yeah-yeah I like that but just to go in another direction
Okay, okay. This can go on for a while
Okay, okay. This can go on for a while
Yeah well we should order some food then
Yeah well we should order some food then

No Joey! Look why don’t, why don’t we just let her decide? Okay?
Hey-hey, we’ll each go out with her one more time. And-and we’ll see who
she likes best

Maybe I’ll take her to that new French restaurant down the
street

Ah yeah—wait a second now! Look we’re gonna have to set a
spending limit on the date. I don’t have the money to take her to a fancy place like
that
Well sorry, that’s what I do on dates
Well sorry, that’s what I do on dates
All right, well I guess I’ll just have to do what I do on dates
So let’s decide on the spending limit
So let’s decide on the spending limit
I was thinking more like a hundred
I was thinking more like a hundred

5.SceneDescription: Ross's apartment, Ross is getting ready for his date with Kristen.

lines.Line: I just wanted to come by and y’know, wish you good luck on your date
Yeah. What time are you meeting her
We have 8:00 reservations at Gramercy Bistro
Wow, that’s in like 20 minutes. You’d better get dressed

Oh. Well good! (To himself) For me. (He picks up a jar of lotion.) What is
this? Did you give yourself a facial
Okay dude! (Finds a receipt.) Hey you uh, you sent Kristen flowers
You spent a hundred dollars. That’s the limit. You’re screwed

Uh actually, I sent the flowers before the actual date. So
technically, technically
I didn’t break any rules. Thanks for stopping by though

Oh-oh! So that’s the way it’s gonna be huh? Yeah I can break the
rules too y’know
Oh yeah? What are you gonna do
Oh yeah? What are you gonna do
Oh yeah? What are you gonna do
Y’know what Ross? I’m not gonna let you get away with this
I don’t think you have much choice
I don’t think you have much choice

Yeah bye-bye! (Exits and comes back in still holding the lotion.) Hey! So
just a light layer

Yes. Yes. Just here (Runs his fingers down the bridge of his nose) and
there (Runs his fingers across his forehead)

6.SceneDescription:
Gramercy Bistro, Ross and Kristen are waiting for their table to be ready.
Ross is returning from talking to the Maitre d'.

lines.Line: So they said our table will be ready in just a few minutes

Oh yeah it’s fine. I guess the more muscles you have the more they
can spasm out of control
Hi! What are you doing here

Oh I like this place. And technically, technically I’m not breaking
any rules so I
Well uh, Ross? This is Joey. Joey? Ross
Well uh, Ross? This is Joey. Joey? Ross

Hi. (They shake hands.) It’s nice to meet you. I used to have a
friend named Joey. I don’t anymore
Our table will be ready in a couple minutes
Sure! I would love to wait with you guys! Thanks! (Sits down.
So Joey umm, you look familiar. Are uh, are you on TV or something
Well Joey doesn’t like to talk about it but, he’s one of the stars of Days Of Our Lives
That’s right! That’s right, don’t you play a woman
That’s right! That’s right, don’t you play a woman
A woman in a man’s body
A woman in a man’s body

So y’know Ross it’s funny ‘cause, you look familiar to me
too. Have you ever been married

Well yes, yes I have. In fact umm, just the other day Kristen and I were
talking about how I’ve been married and how I have a son
So you’ve just married the one time then

Yes. And another time after that. Boy I’m getting hungry! Hey Joey,
have you ever been so hungry on a date that when a girl goes to the bathroom you
ate some
of her food
You said the waiter ate my crab cake
You said the waiter ate my crab cake

(laughs that one off) Yeah. So uh Ross, well now—why did that first
marriage breakup? Was it because the woman was straight or she was a lesbian
Do you two know each other
Do you two know each other

No. It just seems like Ross is the kind of a guy that would marry a woman
on the verge of being a lesbian and then push her over the edge
Wait a minute! Were you on a poster for gonorrhea
Have you ever slept in the same bed as a monkey?
Hey you leave Marcel out of this
Hey you leave Marcel out of this
Fine! Have you ever got stuck in a pair of your own leather pants?
Hey-hey have you ever locked yourself in a TV cabinet VD boy?
Hey-hey have you ever locked yourself in a TV cabinet VD boy?

lines.Character: (They both notice that Kristen has left
lines.Line: They both notice that Kristen has left.
When do you think we lost her

7.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Chandler, Joey, and Ross are watching a basketball game
on the couch.

lines.Line:
(entering) Hey guys! Do you wanna look at the song list for the wedding?
(They ignore her.) Guys
(without turning around) I thought you were gonna be gone all day

lines.Character: (They all slowly turn around to reveal that they are giving themselves a facial
lines.Line: They all slowly turn around to reveal that they are giving themselves a facial.

I’m sorry. I’m sorry. I-I should probably leave you girls
alone. (She heads for the bedroom.

Yeah, laugh all you want but in ten minutes we’re gonna have younger
looking skin

Yeah! (Monica goes in the bedroom.) Y’know, she could use a
little…(Whistles that she needs to do what they’re doing.) (Something happens on
the game.) Oh nice shot!!! (They all cheer.
